professional-course-template-v1.0.name: Professional Course Template v1.0
professional-course-template-v1.0.description: Clean, corporate-style template for course presentations

layouts.name: Title Slide
layouts.description: Course introduction slide with title, subtitle, instructor and date

placeholders.name: {{section_description}}
placeholders.example: Learn to identify and classify personal information

layouts.name: Content Slide
layouts.description: Standard content slide with title and main content area

placeholders.name: {{main_content}}
placeholders.example:
• Name and address
• Phone number
• Email address
• Social Security Number

layouts.name: Two Column
layouts.description: Two-column layout for comparisons or side-by-side content

placeholders.name: {{left_column}}
placeholders.example:
Direct Identifiers:
• Name
• SSN
• Email address

placeholders.name: {{right_column}}
placeholders.example:
Indirect Identifiers:
• Date of birth
• ZIP code
• Job title

layouts.name: Competency Overview
layouts.description: Slide for highlighting specific competencies and learning objectives

placeholders.name: {{competency_description}}
placeholders.example: Can accurately identify and classify different types of personal information in various business contexts

placeholders.name: {{learning_objectives}}
placeholders.description: Specific learning objectives for this competency
placeholders.example: • Distinguish between direct and indirect identifiers\n• Classify information sensitivity levels\n• Apply privacy principles to real scenarios

layouts.name: Activity Instructions
layouts.description: Activity slide with instructions, timing, and materials

placeholders.name: {{activity_instructions}}
placeholders.example:
1. Review the sample documents
2. Identify all personal information
3. Classify each item as direct or indirect
4. Discuss findings with your partner

layouts.name: Q&A / Discussion
layouts.description: Discussion slide with prompt and facilitation notes

placeholders.name: {{discussion_prompt}}
placeholders.example: How would you handle a data breach?

placeholders.name: {{discussion_points}}
placeholders.description: Key discussion points or follow-up questions
placeholders.example: • What steps should be taken immediately?\n• Who should be notified?\n• What documentation is needed?

placeholders.name: {{teaching_notes}}
placeholders.example: Encourage sharing of real experiences. Watch for compliance questions - refer to legal team if needed.

placeholders.name: {{quote_text}}
placeholders.example: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.

layouts.name: Full Image
layouts.description: Full-bleed image slide with caption overlay

placeholders.name: {{image_caption}}
placeholders.description: Optional caption text at bottom of slide
placeholders.example: A team collaborating on a data privacy review

layouts.name: Big Text
layouts.description: Single impactful statement or key message

placeholders.name: {{big_text_content}}
placeholders.description: The key message or statement to display prominently
